alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 26 at 10:17AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following counties, Clinton and Washington. * WHEN...Until 200 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1017 AM CDT, County Sheriff`s Offices reported numerous lingering road closures due to flooding, including portions of state highways. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Breese, New Baden, Nashville, Trenton, Aviston, Okawville, Germantown, Albers, Wamac, Beckemeyer, Lively Grove, Irvington, Ashley, New Memphis, Bartelso, Beaucoup, Hoyleton, Johannisburg, Hoffman and Damiansville. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 34 and 61.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
